title: Zalima Zohair
author: Zalima Zohair
content: I have $550 worth of USDT Trc20 tron.I want to exchange them for BTC.I don't trust exchanges.Please comment with your rate or just paste your telegram handle. I will contact you.I will send first for trusted forum members. If you are low rank you have to send first or pay extra fee for an escrow.

comments.author: aliveNFT
comments.body: i can do it for you, with any available escrow on this forumplaese contact me once you ready

comments.author: Zalima Zohair
comments.body: Quote from: aliveNFT on April 14, 2023, 06:56:33 AMi can do it for you, with any available escrow on this forumplaese contact me once you readyThxI m talking with someone. If no deal, i will reach out to you. Good Day

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.created_time: April 25, 2023, 12:16:42 AMLast edit: May 03, 2023, 07:57:03 PM by Timelord2067
comments.body: I'll take $100.00 USDT TRC20 to wallet address TEvt9NpRM6FoytKLQnpSumsL5cmssnTCo9 in exchange for BTC 0.003636 as calculated here.I'll check back over the next twelve hours.Offer well and truly expired and withdrawn.

comments.author: Timelord2067
